extracted_playbook.title: Identify GitLab Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the installed GitLab version is 16.0.0, which is affected by the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade GitLab to Version 16.0.1
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade GitLab CE/EE from version 16.0.0 to version 16.0.1 to mitigate the vulnerability.
